thread.title: Frank Ocean Just Annotated A Line On Calvin Harris' "Slide" | Genius
thread.title_full: Frank Ocean Just Annotated A Line On Calvin Harris' "Slide" | Genius

title: Frank Ocean Just Annotated A Line On Calvin Harris' "Slide" | Genius
text:
By: Lauren Nostro Photographer: 
Frank Ocean just hopped on Genius to annotate his first line on Calvin Harris ‘ new single “Slide,” which also features Migos . He broke down a lyric off of his verse: 
https://genius.com/11407808 
“Boy With A Pipe” is a painting by Pablo Picasso, which was painted in 1905 during his Rose Period. The oil on canvas painting shows a Parisian boy holding a pipe in his left hand. “Boy With A Pipe” sold for a record-breaking $104.2 million . 
Read all the lyrics to Calvin Harris' “Slide” on Genius now.
